description: Mentioned only by Audsley, who merely cites the example at Riga, and provides no definition.
examplesDescription: Viola Tremolo 8' (Aeoline 8' + Voix celeste 8'), Schwellwerk; Riga Cathedral, Latvia; Walcker 1883.
